message.raw:
Implemented boolean switches in the GUI: whenever a global is boolean, you can now turn it on and off with a click.
Made TreeView selection follow the mouse. This decreases the number of clicks required to edit cells, and prevents the colour of the bool cell being obscured by selection highlight colour.
Fixed a bug introduced in the last commit which hid the delete-global icons
